verses.verse: And the second<WH8145> lot<WH1486> came forth<WH3318> to Simeon,<WH8095> even for the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Simeon<WH8095> according to their families:<WH4940> and their inheritance<WH5159> was<WH1961> within<WH8432> the inheritance<WH5159> of the children<WH1121> of Judah.<WH3063>
And they had<WH1961> in their inheritance<WH5159> Beer-sheba,<WH884> or Sheba,<WH7652> and Moladah,<WH4137>
And Hazarshual,<WH2705> and Balah,<WH1088> and Azem,<WH6107>
And Eltolad,<WH513> and Bethul,<WH1329> and Hormah,<WH2767>
And Ziklag,<WH6860> and Beth-marcaboth,<WH1024> and Hazar-susah,<WH2701>
And Beth-lebaoth,<WH1034> and Sharuhen;<WH8287> thirteen<WH7969> <WH6240> cities<WH5892> and their villages: <WH2691>
Ain, <WH5871> Remmon,<WH7417> and Ether,<WH6281> and Ashan;<WH6228> four<WH702> cities<WH5892> and their villages: <WH2691>

And all<WH3605> the villages<WH2691> that<WH834> were round about<WH5439> these<WH428> cities<WH5892> to<WH5704> Baalath-beer,<WH1192> Ramath<WH7418> of the south.<WH5045> This<WH2063> is the inheritance<WH5159> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Simeon<WH8095> according to their families.<WH4940>

Out of the portion<WH4480> <WH2256> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> was the inheritance<WH5159> of the children<WH1121> of Simeon:<WH8095> for<WH3588> the part<WH2506> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> was<WH1961> too much<WH7227> for them:<WH4480> therefore the children<WH1121> of Simeon<WH8095> had their inheritance<WH5157> within<WH8432> the inheritance<WH5159> of them.

And the third<WH7992> lot<WH1486> came up<WH5927> for the children<WH1121> of Zebulun<WH2074> according to their families:<WH4940> and the border<WH1366> of their inheritance<WH5159> was<WH1961> unto<WH5704> Sarid: <WH8301>

And their border<WH1366> went up<WH5927> toward the sea,<WH3220> and Maralah,<WH4831> and reached<WH6293> to Dabbasheth,<WH1708> and reached<WH6293> to<WH413> the river<WH5158> that<WH834> is before<WH5921> <WH6440> Jokneam;<WH3362>

And turned<WH7725> from Sarid<WH4480> <WH8301> eastward<WH6924> toward the sunrising<WH4217> <WH8121> unto<WH5921> the border<WH1366> of Chisloth-tabor,<WH3696> and then goeth out<WH3318> to<WH413> Daberath,<WH1705> and goeth up<WH5927> to Japhia,<WH3309>
And from thence<WH4480> <WH8033> passeth on along<WH5674> on the east<WH6924> to Gittah-hepher,<WH1662> to Ittah-kazin,<WH6278> and goeth out<WH3318> to Remmon-methoar<WH7417> to Neah;<WH5269>
And the border<WH1366> compasseth<WH5437> it on the north side<WH4480> <WH6828> to Hannathon:<WH2615> and the outgoings<WH8444> thereof are<WH1961> in the valley<WH1516> of Jipthah-el: <WH3317>
And Kattath,<WH7005> and Nahallal,<WH5096> and Shimron,<WH8110> and Idalah,<WH3030> and Bethlehem:<WH1035> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
This <WH2063> is the inheritance<WH5159> of the children<WH1121> of Zebulun<WH2074> according to their families,<WH4940> these<WH428> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
And the fourth<WH7243> lot<WH1486> came out<WH3318> to Issachar,<WH3485> for the children<WH1121> of Issachar<WH3485> according to their families.<WH4940>
And their border<WH1366> was<WH1961> toward Jezreel,<WH3157> and Chesulloth,<WH3694> and Shunem,<WH7766>
And Hapharaim,<WH2663> and Shion,<WH7866> and Anaharath,<WH588>
And Rabbith,<WH7245> and Kishion,<WH7191> and Abez,<WH77>
And Remeth,<WH7432> and En-gannim,<WH5873> and En-haddah,<WH5876> and Beth-pazzez;<WH1048>

And the coast<WH1366> reacheth<WH6293> to Tabor,<WH8396> and Shahazimah,<WH7831> and Beth-shemesh;<WH1053> and the outgoings<WH8444> of their border<WH1366> were<WH1961> at Jordan:<WH3383> sixteen<WH8337> <WH6240> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
This <WH2063> is the inheritance<WH5159> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Issachar<WH3485> according to their families,<WH4940> the cities<WH5892> and their villages.<WH2691>
And the fifth<WH2549> lot<WH1486> came out<WH3318> for the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Asher<WH836> according to their families.<WH4940>
And their border<WH1366> was<WH1961> Helkath,<WH2520> and Hali,<WH2482> and Beten,<WH991> and Achshaph,<WH407>
And Alammelech,<WH487> and Amad,<WH6008> and Misheal;<WH4861> and reacheth<WH6293> to Carmel<WH3760> westward,<WH3220> and to Shihor-libnath;<WH7884>

And turneth<WH7725> toward the sunrising<WH4217> <WH8121> to Beth-dagon,<WH1016> and reacheth<WH6293> to Zebulun,<WH2074> and to the valley<WH1516> of Jipthah-el<WH3317> toward the north side<WH6828> of Beth-emek,<WH1025> and Neiel,<WH5272> and goeth out<WH3318> to<WH413> Cabul<WH3521> on the left hand,<WH8040>
And Hebron,<WH5683> and Rehob,<WH7340> and Hammon,<WH2540> and Kanah,<WH7071> even unto<WH5704> great<WH7227> Zidon;<WH6721>

And then the coast<WH1366> turneth<WH7725> to Ramah,<WH7414> and to<WH5704> the strong<WH4013> city<WH5892> Tyre;<WH6865> and the coast<WH1366> turneth<WH7725> to Hosah;<WH2621> and the outgoings<WH8444> thereof are<WH1961> at the sea<WH3220> from the coast<WH4480> <WH2256> to Achzib: <WH392>
Ummah <WH5981> also, and Aphek,<WH663> and Rehob:<WH7340> twenty<WH6242> and two<WH8147> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
This <WH2063> is the inheritance<WH5159> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Asher<WH836> according to their families,<WH4940> these<WH428> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
The sixth<WH8345> lot<WH1486> came out<WH3318> to the children<WH1121> of Naphtali,<WH5321> even for the children<WH1121> of Naphtali<WH5321> according to their families.<WH4940>

And their coast<WH1366> was<WH1961> from Heleph,<WH4480> <WH2501> from Allon<WH4480> <WH436> to Zaanannim,<WH6815> and Adami,<WH129> Nekeb,<WH5346> and Jabneel,<WH2995> unto<WH5704> Lakum;<WH3946> and the outgoings<WH8444> thereof were<WH1961> at Jordan: <WH3383>

And then the coast<WH1366> turneth<WH7725> westward<WH3220> to Aznoth-tabor,<WH243> and goeth out<WH3318> from thence<WH4480> <WH8033> to Hukkok,<WH2712> and reacheth<WH6293> to Zebulun<WH2074> on the south side,<WH5045> and reacheth<WH6293> to Asher<WH836> on the west side,<WH4480> <WH3220> and to Judah<WH3063> upon Jordan<WH3383> toward the sunrising.<WH4217> <WH8121>
And the fenced<WH4013> cities<WH5892> are Ziddim,<WH6661> Zer,<WH6863> and Hammath,<WH2575> Rakkath,<WH7557> and Chinnereth,<WH3672>
And Adamah,<WH128> and Ramah,<WH7414> and Hazor,<WH2674>
And Kedesh,<WH6943> and Edrei,<WH154> and En-hazor,<WH5877>
And Iron,<WH3375> and Migdal-el,<WH4027> Horem,<WH2765> and Beth-anath,<WH1043> and Beth-shemesh;<WH1053> nineteen<WH8672> <WH6240> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
This <WH2063> is the inheritance<WH5159> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Naphtali<WH5321> according to their families,<WH4940> the cities<WH5892> and their villages.<WH2691>
And the seventh<WH7637> lot<WH1486> came out<WH3318> for the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835> according to their families.<WH4940>
And the coast<WH1366> of their inheritance<WH5159> was<WH1961> Zorah,<WH6881> and Eshtaol,<WH847> and Ir-shemesh,<WH5905>
And Shaalabbin,<WH8169> and Ajalon,<WH357> and Jethlah,<WH3494>
And Elon,<WH356> and Thimnathah,<WH8553> and Ekron,<WH6138>
And Eltekeh,<WH514> and Gibbethon,<WH1405> and Baalath,<WH1191>
And Jehud,<WH3055> and Bene-berak,<WH1139> and Gath-rimmon,<WH1667>
And Me-jarkon,<WH4313> and Rakkon,<WH7542> with<WH5973> the border<WH1366> before<WH4136> Japho.<WH3305>

And the coast<WH1366> of the children<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835> went out<WH3318> too little for them:<WH4480> therefore the children<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835> went up<WH5927> to fight<WH3898> against<WH5973> Leshem,<WH3959> and took<WH3920> it, and smote<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and possessed<WH3423> it, and dwelt<WH3427> therein, and called<WH7121> Leshem,<WH3959> Dan,<WH1835> after the name<WH8034> of Dan<WH1835> their father.<WH1>
This <WH2063> is the inheritance<WH5159> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835> according to their families,<WH4940> these<WH428> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>

When they had made an end<WH3615> of dividing the land for inheritance<WH5157> <WH853> <WH776> by their coasts,<WH1367> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> gave<WH5414> an inheritance<WH5159> to Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126> among<WH8432> them:

According <WH5921> to the word<WH6310> of the LORD<WH3068> they gave<WH5414> him<WH853> the city<WH5892> which<WH834> he asked,<WH7592> even<WH853> Timnathserah<WH8556> in mount<WH2022> Ephraim:<WH669> and he built<WH1129> <WH853> the city,<WH5892> and dwelt<WH3427> therein.

These <WH428> are the inheritances,<WH5159> which<WH834> Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> and the heads<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1> of the tribes<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> divided for an inheritance<WH5157> by lot<WH1486> in Shiloh<WH7887> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> at the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation.<WH4150> So they made an end<WH3615> of dividing<WH4480> <WH2505> <WH853> the country.<WH776>
